Package ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.guessnumber.core.service

Class CoreGameLogicServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.gameconsoleapp.guessnumber.core.service.CoreGameLogicServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoreGameLogicService
    @Service
public class CoreGameLogicServiceImpl
extends Object
implements CoreGameLogicService
    CoreGameLogicServiceImpl Implementation of the Core Game Logic interface. Implements the core game logic.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    created by Urs Albisser, on 2020-01-07

        public void checkGuess()
        check() Check guess. Adjust biggest threshold if guess is too high. Adjust smallest threshold if guess is too low. remainingGuesses -1.
